title: our HOT takes & unpopular opinions
itunes:title: our HOT takes & unpopular opinions
description:
Brooke and Danielle are doing ANOTHER hot takes/unpopular opinions episode!  The gals are back with some extremely HOT takes, some freezing cold takes, and everything in between.  The gals also catch up on their experience at Gov Ball, their weekends, and what’s to come for the start of the summer!  Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories!
